mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ridx,rtype,rprice,lidx,lodgingname,limagename,avgrv FROM (SELECT rm.ridx ,rm.rtype ,rm.rprice ,l.lidx ,l.lodgingname ,l.limagename ,TRUNC (rv.avgrv,1) AS avgrv FROM roomtb rm ,(SELECT ridx, AVG(rvsatisfaction) AS avgrv FROM reviewtb GROUP BY ridx) rv,lodgingtb l WHERE rm.ridx = rv.ridx AND l.lidx = rm.lidx AND ROWNUM <= 18 ORDER by rv.avgrv DESC))
SELECT ridx ,COUNT(*) as cnt FROM (SELECT ridx FROM reservtb WHERE schedulerCheck = 'N' AND TO_DATE(reserv_endDate) < SYSDATE) a GROUP BY ridx
SELECT ftidx ,ftname ,ftAddr ,ftSubContent ,ftImgName FROM festivaltb WHERE ROWNUM <=6 AND FTREGISTRATION = 'Y' ORDER BY ftUpdate asc
SELECT ftName ,ftMainContent ,ftLink ,ftLatitude ,ftLongitude ,ftImgName FROM FESTIVALTB WHERE ftidx = #{ftidx}
SELECT tidx ,tname ,tAddr ,tSubContent ,tImgName FROM triptb WHERE ROWNUM <=6 AND TREGISTRATION = 'Y' ORDER BY tUpdate asc
SELECT tName ,tMainContent ,tLink ,tLatitude ,tLongitude ,tImgName FROM TRIPTB WHERE tidx = #{tidx}
